nodes.text: R0-B5U was an astromech droid that served with Yarvok among the Nova Blades pirates. R0-B5U participated in the Dantooine Incursion and was stationed at the entrance of the Dantooine Power Station to accept ransom payments totalling fifteen million credits in exchange for the station's reactor.

R0-B5U first appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion. If the player pays R0-B5U the fifteen million credits Yarvok demands, the Nova Blades will leave peacefully, however, if the player does not, Yarvok will need to defeated in battle to prompt the pirates to retreat.
